text: Donald Hugh (Don) Harron (September 19, 1924 – January 17, 2015) was a Canadian comedian, actor, television director, journalist, author, playwright and composer. Harron was known for his roles in Charlie Farquharson and in Anne of Green Gables – The Musical. He hosted the radio program, Morningside. Harron was born in Toronto, Ontario. Harron died in Toronto from cancer, aged 90.
